overview: Director Blue Blake, a man with a real knack for delivering something different when it comes to gay porn, has done it yet again. With a bodybuilder as big as a small building, Duke Miller, he has staged an outdoor gang-bang like none I've seen before -- the biggest guy of the bunch is the gang-bangee, not the gang-banger. This switcheroo is a nice change of pace, to say the least. The overall premise is simple. The "lumberjacks" (many of whom look like they've really swung an axe or two in their day) get together for a six-month stay in the woods to chop and haul wood in the wilderness. Because there are no women available and the men feign heterosexuality (for the purpose of the storyline, natch), they pull straws to decide who will be the "camp bitch." Well, needless to say, given the title, "Duke Miller's Lumberjack Gang Bang," Mr. Miller is the loser -- or is that winner? -- and the proceedings get underway.
title: Duke Miller's Lumberjack Gang Bang
